original_text: For on the first day of the first month he began to go up from Babylonia, and on the first day of the fifth month he came to Jerusalem, for the good hand of his God was on him.
korean_text: 첫째 달 초하루에 바벨론에서 길을 떠났고 하나님의 선한 손의 도우심을 입어 다섯째 달 초하루에 예루살렘에 이르니라

sentences.original_text: For on the first day of the first month
he began to go up from Babylonia
and on the first day of the fifth month
for the good hand of his God was on him
sentences.korean_translation: 이는 그의 하나님의 선한 손이 그와 함께 하셨기 때문이다
